name: incident
description: Initial incident domain for DPR Proof of Concept
author: michael.w.clarke@justice.gov.uk

transform.viewText: SELECT id, 'USE_OF_FORCE' as type, incident_date, agency_id, offender_no from use_of_force.report

select nomis.offender_bookings.offender_book_id as id, nomis.offenders.birth_date as birth_date, nomis.offender_bookings.living_unit_id as living_unit_id, nomis.offenders.first_name as first_name, nomis.offenders.last_name as last_name, nomis.offenders.offender_id_display as offender_no from nomis.offender_bookings join nomis.offenders on nomis.offender_bookings.offender_id = nomis.offenders.offender_id
